creator: jtate@dragonstrider.com
text:
lingering_close is available in 2.0 as ap_lingering_close.  I would like to see
it available for external modules in 1.3.  If no further development work is to
happen on 1.3 please ignore this enhancement request.

Not really. 1.3 is more or less in maintenance mode.

Thanks for using Apache!
creator: nd@perlig.de
